title: Teen injured in accidental shooting
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
Memphis Police responded to a shooting in the 3500 block of Metropolitan Lane.
Officers said a 16-year-old was shot and later taken to Regional Medical Center in critical condition. That teenager was later upgraded to stable condition after arriving at the hospital.
Investigators determined the shooting was accidental. The person who accidentally fired the gun stayed on scene and cooperated with investigators.
That person was detained, but police have not said what, if any, charges he will face.
